* The lib directory contains all the files that you need to reference in your project.

* IQToolKitCodeGen can be used to generate Entities, Mapping, and a DataContext for use with LINQ to VFP.

* LinqToVfpLinqPadDriver.lpx is, as the name indicates, a LINQPad driver which will allow you to connect VFP data via LINQ to VFP.
